refentry:
$Date$ $Revision$
elements refsectioninfo refsectioninfo Element
refsectioninfo &refsectioninfo.purpose;
&refsectioninfo.synopsis.gen; Description
Like the other info elements, refsectioninfo contains meta-information about the section of the document in which it occurs.
Processing expectations
&format.suppress; Many of the elements in this wrapper may be used in presentation, but they are not generally printed as part of the formatting of the wrapper. The wrapper merely serves to identify where they occur.
&refsectioninfo.parents.gen; &refsectioninfo.children.gen;
